ooC: quick post before i leave for work

HN, "finish it in a very violent way"? There was no it, not until 
you replied to tankor's little blurb saying he likes the TF movie 
regardless of whether you dislike it or not. That's not a hostile 
comment, but your reply certainly was. I certainly don't want to 
offend you, but I'm really not sure why you've gone into hostile 
rant mode. You can't really take moding out on tankor as an offense 
punishable by death, since he was a new role player when he started. 
In other words, learning how to role play. 

As Stacy said: Opinions are & will be voiced. If you don't agree 
with them, then don't shoot down someone for it. Let alone the use 
of name calling & foul language. It's bad sportsmanship. 

You've got a lot of experience behind your back, you should know and 
understand this.

Lastly before I leave, I really have no clue how you managed to 
decide that everyone hates you and you're not wanted here. No one 
was taking shots at you from what I can see.

*sighs* hopefully I haven't just walked myself into the gas 
chamber... ^^"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
<hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> Oh, WAIT a minute. I HAD to post again now that I remember THIS 
little tidbit. I'm sure you all won't mind, since I'm going to be 
gone anyway, right?
> 
> Tankor? Boy, aren't you that same guy who moded me a bit back by 
ignoring my shots despite me repeatedly asking you to acknowledge 
them? Kid, you've got a LOT to learn about RPGing, but if you can 
pull stunts like that and get away with it completely free, bravo. 
Me and Cardhead fought, didn't always agree, but we at least agreed 
that you, Tankor, are a moder. And that is all I've got to say.
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Hollywood Narrator 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, June 13, 2003 4:31 AM
>   Subject: My Sundown...
> 
> 
>   After some consideration I've decided that I'm going to be 
leaving. It's obvious that many here hate me and I shouldn't be a 
member of this RPG. I simply cannot sit idly by while people take 
shots at me, I always must respond. For this, I am an outcast, and 
not fit to post here, let alone hang around here. So, hopefully for 
the final time, I am gone. Goodbye, and good luck.
> 
>   "Here I am beside myself... again."
> 
>   HN
